about_the_game:
-JUST STOP THINKING-

Negative Reverie is a retro-handheld-inspired RPG about technology, violence and animal intelligence... or the lack thereof.

Face the darkest side of Corporate America with Vuota, a young woman with a natural talent for violence, a hacksaw, and a mission to take down the CEO of the FamilyTech Corporation. With the right skills, tactics, outfits and allies, she might be able to overcome the oppression of modern technology culture... and possibly discover something even darker waiting below...

FEATURES

  • The "F.I.T." System - "Dress for the stats you want!" Equip clothing of similar brands to unlock game-changing effects!

  • The FamilyTech Network - Log in to FamilyTech's in-house (in-game) network to exchange tokens, shop online and pick up orders! 

  • Stealing - "That weapon looks a little too pricey?" Work up that courage and give it the ol' five finger discount!

  • Swappable Palettes - "As if four colors weren't enough!" Acquire new color palettes for completing various feats to stylize your very own descent into madness!

  • Minigames! - "Nothing is ever easy." Need to access information? Capcha minigame! Need to open a door? Biometric PIN minigame! Whatever your needs, the technology of the future has a way to make it a whole thing.

OTHER THINGS:

  • Achievements! (Aspirational, for now :) )

content_descriptors.notes: Negative Reverie contains some depictions of blood and violence, depictions of smoking tobacco, and depictions of the use of generic legal substances (i.e. "Depressants", "Stimulants", etc.)
